title: Online Costume Meeting
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Kotori-san, Ruby is just finishing up here, but do you think this is good? Ruby talked about it with You-chan, but we can’t really decide…. Umm…. It’s this hem right here, can you see it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Yeah, I can see it~. I think it’s fine to leave it like that…. But, maybe it’ll be better if you double stitch it. The strength will be so much different<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Double stitch? Won’t that look bad?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>The frills will hide it so it’s okay. Aqours’ dance are quite intense, so I think it’s better to give it more strength<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby sees, that might be true….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Just in case, ask You-chan about it too, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yeah! Thank you, Kotori-san! I’m glad I was able to talk with you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu, it’s so convenient that we can see and talk to each other even if we’re separated huh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>But…. It makes Ruby want to meet you directly….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>P-, please don’t make that face! We’ll be able to see each other soon~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
